abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Martial Bliss: The Story of The Military Bookman by Margaretta Barton Colt.
lead_paragraph: Margaretta Barton Colt’s self-published book details the 27-year life of the Military Bookman, a specialty antiquarian shop she and her husband ran on the Upper East Side.

headline.main: Review: ‘Martial Bliss,’ a Loving Memoir About a Bookstore for Military Buffs
headline.print_headline: Marshaling an Army of Military Memories

snippet: Margaretta Barton Colt’s self-published book details the 27-year life of the Military Bookman, a specialty antiquarian shop she and her husband ran on the Upper East Side.
